meanings: put a touch[dash] of brandy in coffee

vlive.korean: [소량 덜어 내어 칙칙한 눈 밑에 얇게 펴 발라 주면!] [Take a small amount and spread it thinly under your eyes!] View video K Beauty-TIP : [1분팁] 화사함을 UP! 시켜줄 핑크 컬러 메이크업템
vlive.english: [Take a small amount and spread it thinly under your eyes!]

vlive.korean: 좀 소량만 써서... so just use a little of it. 듣기 View video V Beauty : 개강맞이 여신 메이크업 / Become a goddess at begin school
vlive.english: so just use a little of it.

vlive.korean: 소량만 있으니까. Because there is less hair over here. 듣기 View video V Beauty : [박서울x살롱드부띠끄] 레드벨벳 아이린 토끼피부/여신머리 배워보자!! [Redvelvet Irene]
vlive.english: Because there is less hair over here.

vlive.korean: 소량만 필요해서 소량만 이렇게. We just need a small portion, so I have this much. 듣기 View video KKOSISTERS : 파워퍼프걸 아트 메이크업 The powerpuff Girls inspired Art makeup
vlive.english: We just need a small portion, so I have this much.

vlive.korean: 이게 소량 섞어지면 슬라... If a little is mixed in, the slime... 듣기 View video V PICK! : [V PICK! HOW TO in V] 이현주의 슬라임 (HOW TO MAKE LEE HYUNJU’s Slime)
vlive.english: If a little is mixed in, the slime...

examples.korean: an instrument that can detect small amounts of radiation 듣기 Add to Wordbook 소량의 방사능도 탐지할 수 있는 기구 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: an instrument that can detect small amounts of radiation Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: As part of the diet, allow yourself a small daily ration of sugar. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 음식의 일부로 먹는 설탕은 매일 소량만 섭취하도록 하라. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: As part of the diet, allow yourself a small daily ration of sugar. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The retailer rereeled the thread to sell it in smaller quantities. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 소매업자는 실을 소량으로 판매하기 위해 다른 곳에 되감았다. 국제영어대학원대학교 신어사전
examples.english: The retailer rereeled the thread to sell it in smaller quantities. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: We make good-quality merchandise in small quantities. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리는 양질의 제품을 소량 생산한다 Neungyule
examples.english: We make good-quality merchandise in small quantities. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Those crackers have an infinitesimal amount of salt. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이 크래커에는 소금이 아주 소량 들어있다. Neungyule
examples.english: Those crackers have an infinitesimal amount of salt. Add to Wordbook
